articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.title: The OnePlus Pad 2’s vibrating stylus feels almost like writing on paper - The Verge
articles.description: The $549.99 OnePlus Pad 2, available on July 30th, includes 12GB of RAM and 256GB of storage. The new Stylo 2 stylus will be a $99.99 upgrade.
articles.content:
The OnePlus Pad 2s vibrating stylus simulates writing on paper
